text: Romy and Michele's High School Reunion is an American comedy movie released by Touchstone Pictures. It stars Lisa Kudrow, Mira Sorvino, Janeane Garofalo and Camryn Manheim. The movie is about a 10 year high school reunion at which Romy and Michele are planning to impress their former school classmates. The movie was released in April 1997. title: Romy and Michele's High School Reunion
